WorkItem.Description:
Starting from v0.9.1 generated definitions include reference comments. This change broke my build script, because I was copying definitions from directory were they were created to another folder. Now this makes reference point to wrong location.
Having references in definitions is a good thing, but I propose to add additional command-line option to specify output location for definition file to handle such cases.
WorkItem.Summary: Add command line option to specify location of d.ts files

Comments.Message:
For anyone who has the same problem comment-out line 31570:
```
this.declFile.WriteLine('/// <reference path="' + declFileName + '" />');
```
Updated title and assigned to Jon who handles our suggestions.
